item.description: We are an awesomely fun group of interesting people who love to golf and want to get out on different courses regularly to work on our game. We welcome beginners and will make every effort to match you up with other beginners so you can progress at your own pace. We try to schedule at least one event per week—from April through November—and we play at various courses in central Connecticut such as Top Stone, Rockledge, Tunxis, Stanley, and Goodwin. Suggestions for other locations are welcome. We also schedule driving range meetups occasionally, with drinks/dinner afterwards. This is a great way to network, get some exercise, enjoy the outdoors, and meet new people, and maybe kick up your game a notch or two. We only ask that you commit one way or the other several days before the event (no maybes!) since tee times have to be scheduled firmly in advance. We also ask that you be considerate of your fellow golfers and avoid last minute no-shows. Please join us, and feel free to email the organizer or assistant organizers if you have any questions or suggestions on how we can improve the group.
item.name: The Central CT Golf Meetup
